nodes.bodyText:
Fine to remove the assert, but... it does mean we are not checking the output of executeUpdate method?
What if the row failed updating it? 🤔

We do not have much to check. The update is restricted to just one row so the only possible outputs are two: 1 (row updated) or 0 (rows updated) - there cannot be more.
Before commit bb406bc, an output of 0 would signal an error, as we were definitely expecting 1 row to be updated. After the commit, we changed the query and both 1 and 0 are OK as outputs.
So there is nothing really left to check here, and in particular, failing on 0 is wrong, thus I am removing the check.
